features: SO LUX, LESS BUCKS: Say goodbye to separate shave cream for men and women that do exactly the same thing...give you a smooth shave. Oh yeah, and you get it at a great price.
SMOOTH MOVE: Our shave cream gives a comfy and super-close shave that leaves skin about as soft as a cloud made of fresh marshmallows. Just about.
ALOE YOU VERA MUCH: Aloe Vera gives a moisturizing, nourishing, and soothing effect to your legs, face, pits, toes or whatever hair you shave.
EASY E: We added Vitamin E to enhance the glide of your razor and protect your against irritation.
BACK AT IT ARGAN: Us. Shave Cream also includes argan oil, which is the bomb.com at protecting your skin against dryness.
body.description: Meet Us. Shave Cream. It can give you a comfortable and extra-close shave that will leave your skin soft and smooth after your shave. Our shave cream features a special brew of hydrating ingredients that your skin will L-O-V-E. • Aloe Vera helps provide a moisturizing, nourishing, and soothing effect. • Vitamin E helps enhance the glide of your razor and protect your skin against irritation while shaving. • Argan Oil aids in protecting your skin against dryness. We're inclusive and love to invite everyone to the party, but alcohol, dyes and sulfates are not welcome here. (TBH, they just aren't good houseguests.) Us. Shave Cream is also not tested on animals because we love all creatures from ants to apes. This shaving cream can be used with any of our Us. Razors. Haven't tried our razors yet? You should. They're awesome. Here’s the way to get the best results from our shave cream: wet your skin with warm water, apply a small amount and work Us. up into a lather. The shave cream is easily rinsed away and won't leave behind any residue. Join Us. You’ll Like Us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Give Us Five You know what’s high-five worthy? A razor with 5 flexible blades that give you an ultra-close shave on both fine and coarse hair. Hands up for high-fives, low-fives and medium-height fives. ​ Slip Into Something Comfortable Our lubrication strip is infused with aloe and vitamin E. The smooth glide and less irritation will have you saying “Aloe you vera much,” to our razors. Get a Grip We encourage you to get a grip...on our handle. A high-quality, non-slip metal handle with textured grip offers control at any angle and a pivoting head adapts to the contours of your body. ​ Live On The Edge An edging blade? Have we thought of everything? Not yet. We’re still trying to figure out why hot dogs come in packs of 10, but hot dog buns come in packs of eight. But we digress... Each of our razors has an edging blade that is ideal for precision shaving hard-to-reach areas (sideburns, under nose, bikini line – you get the idea). ​

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells and feels great
reviews.reviewText: A friend introduced me to this shaving cream and I fell in love with it. I have a full thick beard that grows quickly , hate to shave but this makes shaving something to look forward to, for 2 reasons. Unlike shaving cream in a can , this comes out of the tube thick and has this luxurious soft, lotion-y feel to it. A little goes a long way and feels great as it goes on. Second, it smells fantastic, not obnoxious like many men's products do although this is aimed at both men and women. I could not find it in a store and not only is it here on Amazon, it is much cheaper than any shaving cream in a tube I saw in stores. I love the feel of this even in my hands and the fragrance is amazing. Makes for a great close shave too and leaves your skin super soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I previously used Gillette Pure, which is good but a little expensive. That was out of stock, so I tried Bic's version.It works great, but different. The Gillette stuff worked best if I mix in a small amount of water first (less razor clogging). Bic's doesn't mix with water as well, but works great if I put it on my face first and then douse myself with water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected but OK
reviews.reviewText: They do not fit the BIC handle I have but they do fit my old Gillette Mach 3 handle perfectly.Why do razor companies make propriety ways of connecting things? That's a rhetorical question, the answer is because they are greedy and want to trap you in their financial ecosystem - just like HP and their ink monopoly. Kudos to BIC for making a compatible product - although I hope it's not just a rebranded Gillette product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a good product for a great price. Works well for a bald head.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works as well as expensive blades

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best razor for shaving legs!
reviews.reviewText: I've always bought men's razors for a closer, cleaner shave for my legs. This unisex razor is perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not too good
reviews.reviewText: Good price but felt oily and I didn’t like the smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Shave Ever
reviews.reviewText: Bought the US razor for my husband and he cannot stop raving. He says it's the closest and best Shave. It took me forever to find refills (thanks amazon). I have not tried it yet. It is supposed to be made for men and women. I am looking forward to it though
